text: Siddhi Savetsila (, , , 7 January 1919 â€“ 5 December 2015) was a Thai air force officer and politician. He served as the foreign minister of Thailand from 1980 to 1990. He was the Deputy Prime Minister of Thailand serving from January through August 1986. He has been a member of the Privy Council of King Bhumibol Adulyadej. Savetsila died at the age of 96 in Bangkok on 5 December 2015. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Military personnel of World War II Siddhi Savetsila Siddhi Savetsila Siddhi Savetsila
